privacy.basicData: PagoPA collects basic personal data to allow you to create and use your DevPortal account. This data is collected during registration and profile update. PagoPA ensures your data is handled securely and justifies its use according to PagoPA's Privacy Policy. Your basic personal data will be kept as long as you have an active account on PagoPA DevPortal.
privacy.title: Privacy

statement.text: Our $labelOfLinkToReplace$ provides detailed information on your privacy rights.

deleteAccount.sectionLabel: You can decide to delete your PagoPA DevPortal account at any time. Your data will be deleted from our systems.
deleteAccount.modalTitle: Do you confirm you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.modalText: If you delete your PagoPA DevPortal account all your preferences and data will be deleted from our systems. This action is irreversible.

chatBot.title: Discovery
chatBot.welcomeMessage:
**Welcome to Dev Portal!**

I am _Discovery_, your virtual assistant for technical documentation. I can help you with information on APIs, guides, and more.

_Note_: Discovery is in beta, so some answers may not be accurate. Always verify important information with official documentation.

How can I help you today?
chatBot.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete all past conversations?
chatBot.guestMessage:
Hi, I'm _Discovery_, the DevPortal chatbot!

I can help you find information in the Portal documentation simply and quickly.

To access the service, I invite you to [login]({host}/auth/login)

feedback.contextRelevancy: How relevant is the chatbot's answer to your question?
feedback.responseRelevancy: How faithful is the chatbot's answer to the documentation?
feedback.comment: What were you not satisfied with in the chatbot's answer?*
feedback.mandatoryFields: *Filling in this field is mandatory for sending feedback

errors.title: Error
errors.serviceDown: The chatbot is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.queryFailed: The chatbot had trouble formulating the answer. Please try again.

chatBot.thereAreNoMessages: There are no messages in this session
